attributes.action: perhaps remove Darwin from the £10 bank note but certainly teach the difference between natural selection and the origin of thoses species.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After 150 years of dominance by the Philosophy of Naturalism, it is time to recognise that we have swung away from 'other' interpretations of the evidence. This is largely due to church abuse while it had sole interpretion of reality.  This reactionary swing has stifled debate about origins and therefore knowledge.  The great presumption that "nature is all there is and all basic truths are truths of nature" has nothing to do with science and just as much a decision about origins as in being convinced that there is an Intelligent Designer 'behind', 'above', 'beyond' nature.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
